name: DFY AI Visibility
description: DFY AI Visibility provides done-for-you AI optimization and schema publishing services designed to get businesses cited, recommended, and visible in AI search engines such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Perplexity, Claude, and DeepSeek.
mission: To make businesses discoverable and credible in the age of AI by ensuring their data, expertise, and reputation are recognized by intelligent assistants and search engines.
vision: To become the trusted global provider of AI visibility systems that connect verified, transparent, and high-authority brands with every major AI platform and search ecosystem.
